content.question: The repetition of form and color in Christo and Jeanne-Claudeâ€™s installation The Gates is most strongly intended to call attention to which of the following?

choices.label: The materials and impermanence of the work
The lines of the walking paths in the park
The static nature of the rigid vinyl gates

content.answer: The lines of the walking paths in the park

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
